org.owasp.dependencycheck.data.nvdcve

Class CveItemOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.owasp.dependencycheck.data.nvdcve.CveItemOperator

  • public class CveItemOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for processing DefCveItem in order to extract key values like textual description and ecosystem type.
    Author:
    skjolber

      • isRejected

        public boolean isRejected(java.lang.String description)
        Determines if the CVE entry is rejected.
        Parameters:
        description - the CVE description
        Returns:
        true if the CVE was rejected; otherwise false

      • testCveCpeStartWithFilter

        protected boolean testCveCpeStartWithFilter(io.github.jeremylong.openvulnerability.client.nvd.DefCveItem cve)
        Tests the CVE's CPE entries against the starts with filter. In general this limits the CVEs imported to just application level vulnerabilities.
        Parameters:
        cve - the CVE entry to examine
        Returns:
        true if the CVE affects CPEs identified by the configured CPE Starts with filter
